description: This file defines utility functions to resolve command paths in the cross-spawn package, primarily used for executing commands in Node.js environment with path resolution.

methods.name: resolveCommandAttempt
methods.description: Attempts to resolve the command to an absolute path, optionally with a custom current working directory and environment path settings.

methods.name: resolveCommand
methods.description: Attempts to resolve the command path, first normally then with a fallback that ignores certain path extensions.
